name: Dark Contract Library
text: During your Main Phase: You can add 1 "Dark Contract" card from your Deck to your hand with a different name than the cards you control. You can only use this effect of "Dark Contract Library" once per turn. If this card would be destroyed, you can banish 1 "Dark Contract" card from your GY instead, except "Dark Contract Library". Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Take 1000 damage for each "Dark Contract card with a different name you control.
